lead_paragraph: Although LeBron James is getting Sports Illustrated's Sportsperson of the Year award, Michael Phelps' phenomenal year won't go unrecognized at an event next week that will celebrate both athletes.

headline.main: Phelps to Get Special Honor From SI at Ceremony
headline.print_headline: Phelps to Get Special Honor From SI at Ceremony

snippet: Although LeBron James is getting Sports Illustrated's Sportsperson of the Year award, Michael Phelps' phenomenal year won't go unrecognized at an event next week that will celebrate both athletes....
